# Rishi Mullur

> Rishi Mullur is a builder of things â€” mostly software, sometimes systems, occasionally organizations. He has been a programmer, a product manager, and a founder, depending on what needed to get built at the moment. Based in San Francisco Bay Area.

## Site Structure

- [Home](https://rishim.xyz/): Main page with author bio and latest writings
- [About](https://rishim.xyz/about): Detailed profile and background
- [Writing](https://rishim.xyz/writing): Essays and reflections on technology, software, and craft

## Writing

- [Can the Real Homunculus Please Stand Up?](https://rishim.xyz/writing/can-the-real-homunculus-please-stand-up): On consciousness, intelligence, and the little voice in your head.
- [Slop on the Internet and Walled Gardens](https://rishim.xyz/writing/slop-on-the-internet-and-walled-gardens): On the age of generated content, the erosion of implicit trust, and the rise of curated digital sanctuaries.
